name: PhoenixPlanetaryAlmanac
0:
”Alexa, open Phoenix Planetary Almanac”
”Tell me about tomorrow”
”Tell me my planetary age”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: phoenix planetary almanac
des:
The Phoenix Planetary Almanac can respond to invocations like the following: Tell me about November 2nd; Tell me about yesterday; Tell me about today; Tell me about tomorrow; Tell me about June, 4th, 2022; My birthday is March 3rd, 2004; Tell me about my planetary age; Erase birthday; Tell me more; and Help. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

PRIVACY POLICY 

Last updated: April 10, 2022.

The Phoenix Planetary Almanac skill allows you to provide a birth date so that it can provide a customized greeting when the skill is started. Providing a date enables additional functions within the skill (a birthday greeting on start-up and the "Tell me about my planetary age" request). Other functions of the skill do not require a birth date.

You may provide any date. It is stored in an "S3 Bucket" linked to your Alexa account. The Skill Developer does not have access to this information and no information is transmitted back to the Skill Developer. While this storage method is intended to be secure, the Skill Developer does not manage this storage service and makes no warranty about its security; use the “Erase Birthday” command to ensure no date is in storage for this Skill.

No unique information related to your account is transmitted to the Skill Developer. Amazon provides the Skill Developer with reports of usage analytics, which contain information on how all Skill Users as a group are using the Skill.

The Skill Developer may at any time update this Privacy Policy, although no changes in data storage or use are anticipated.

General privacy policy information for Skills is provided here: https://www.alexa.com/help/privacy.
